action.action-desc: Mr. Perry (for himself, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mrs. Boebert, and Mr. Gohmert) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to prohibit the President from making provision for the purchase of solar panels under the authority of such Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Planes Not Panels Act.
Section 303(a) of the Defense Production Act of 1950 (50 U.S.C. 4533(a)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: The President may not use any authority under this section to make provision for purchases of or commitments to purchase solar panels.
In this paragraph, the term solar panel means a crystalline silicon photovoltaic cell or module.
